tasks.title: Git merge forensic analysis - verify codebase health
Implement test suite at session start/end hooks
tasks.description: Run full test suite on SessionStart (validate baseline, postpone if failing) and SessionEnd (validate no regressions before commit/merge/push). Part of Continuous Consciousness Sprint 2.

tasks.title: Implement checkpoint commit system for crash protection
tasks.description: Auto-commit to WIP branch every 15 minutes with 'wip: Checkpoint [timestamp]' messages. Squash on session end. Protects against session termination/crash. Part of Continuous Consciousness Sprint 2.

tasks.title: Add Related Documents section to roadmap
tasks.description: Add links to: ml-milestone-thresholds.md, ml-training-best-practices.md, merge-friendly-tasks.md, definition-of-done.md, dogfooding-checklist.md, text-as-memories.md, parallel-agent-orchestration.md
